name: Retro Snake (itch) (Eduardo Pavanatti)
description:
Implementation of a retro Snake game made in Unity with some additional features.

Developed as part of the Game Design and Development course offered by the Michigan State University.

Instructions:

- Move the Snake with the arrow or WASD keys.

- Avoid the enemy Snake and the scnenario's barriers.

- Eat food to grow and score points.

- Eat special (red) food to gain additional lives.

- Eat special (blue) food to increase speed.

 Best played in 1920x1080 resolution.
